snippet: Butler set a playoff career high for the second straight game with 31 points, and Chicago beat the Milwaukee Bucks to take a 2-0 lead in their first-round series.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls beat Milwaukee Bucks, 91-82, taking 2-0 lead in first-round playoff series; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Butler set a playoff career high for the second straight game with 31 points, and Chicago beat the Milwaukee Bucks to take a 2-0 lead in their first-round series.

headline.print_headline: Butler Stars Again for the Bulls
headline.main: Jimmy Butler Stars Again for the Bulls
